titles.title: Growing American Food Exports Act of 2018
To amend the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to update the Biotechnology and Agricultural Trade Program, and for other purposes.
Growing American Food Exports Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock and Foreign Agriculture.

bill.summary:
Growing American Food Exports Act of 2018
This bill amends the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to reauthorize through FY2023 and modify the Department of Agriculture Biotechnology and Agricultural Trade Program. The purpose of the program is to remove, resolve, or mitigate significant regulatory nontariff barriers to the export of U.S. agricultural commodities into foreign markets through policy advocacy and certain targeted projects.
